title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali | SEND in numbers
description: Learn about the data related to sent notifications, institutions that are using SEND and service types

hero.title: SEND in numbers
hero.description: On this page, you can find daily updated data for the

sent_notifications.title: SEND notifications sent
sent_notifications.description: The data refers to legally binding communications sent by participating institutions.
sent_notifications.filters: Use the selectors below to filter this section for the desired time period.

total.name: total
total.title: Total SEND notifications sent
total.description: A SEND notification is a legally binding communication officially issued by an institution. It can be delivered digitally or in paper form.
total.description_2: Total notifications sent since the platform's first year of operation

digital.name: digital
digital.title: Number of digital SEND notifications
digital.description: SEND notifications sent to recipients via certified digital channels

analog.name: analog
analog.title: Number of analog SEND notifications
analog.description: SEND notifications sent in paper form due to the absence of certified digital channels for the recipient

trend.title: SEND notifications trend
trend.description: Trend of SEND notifications officially issued by a participating institution.
trend.note: The cumulative value is the progressive sum of a quantity over time.

entities.title: Institutions on SEND
entities.description: Participating institutions that have sent at least one SEND notification since the service launch.

total.title: Total institutions on SEND
total.description: Total number of institutions that have sent at least one SEND notification.

municipalities.title: Percentage of municipalities over total institutions on SEND

geographic_distribution.title: Geographic distribution of municipalities on SEND
geographic_distribution.description: The chart shows the distribution of municipalities using SEND, as the entity category with the highest number of participants.

absolute.name: absolute
absolute.description: Bubble size indicates the number of municipalities per region.

percentage.name: percentage
percentage.description: The coloring shows the percentage of active municipalities in each region.

tooltip.percentage: Percentage of municipalities compared to the total number of municipalities in the region

notification_types.title: Main areas of SEND notifications
notification_types.description: Most frequently sent categories of SEND notifications.

main_scopes.title: Filter by type of participating institution
main_scopes.note_1: *different from those whose notification is excluded via SEND under Art. 26, paragraph 17 D.L. 76/2020
main_scopes.note_2: The chart includes the main sectors with 5 or more notifications sent.
